name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CustoMeow Selector: Get your Add to Cart Button element

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a browser plugin used by CustoMeow to connect to the store.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How it works?

1. Browse your store product page
2. Find your Add to Cart button and Buy Now button
3. Assign the button type of your choice
4. Simulate click test
5. Copy the code

Paste your button code back into CustoMeow
You're done!
